title: Is Lulu ult supposed to interrupt Miss Fortunes?
body:
So apparently that's a thing. Like, MF ults > Lulu ults MF during MF ult, auto cancels MF's. I dont remember it doing that before because I've played MF/Lulu lanes before, and I simply don't remember that being an issue. I can see HOW it might cancel her ult but....it just doesn't seem fair that it does. 

Is this a bug or just something purposeful? Irritating either way but....

replies.body:
It's a bug.

Lulu's ult does not interrupt ally channels, and never should.
Doesn't it also cancel an ally katarina's ult as well?
It should not.
it probably does, but yea it shouldn't
It would make sense for an enemy MF but I'm shocked it still functions like that for allies as well.
You can't ult an enemy MF :P

yes you can, having a ally stand near the mf and ulting the ally will knock up mf.

https://i.gyazo.com/0a6bbae5d96b6c048a7205860bd5db79.png
Oh. I thought he meant like literally ulting the enemy to change their size. I was super confused lmao.
xD I know that! I meant like, ulting an ally right next to her to try to interrupt it. That would make more sense :p

Agreed, MF ult shouldn't get interrupted by an allied Lulu ult. Thankfully, from what I can see it doesn't. Do you have a video of this occurring, or is it possible something else happened at the same time that actually interrupted the ult channel?
If you ever want to piss off an allied MF {{champion:48}}
Ability that can interrupt allied chanels, ults and recalls on troll. Yeah, that's what you call "When champion meets their deisgn fantasy" :D
And enemy Yasuos used to be able to ult off it.
Enemy Yasuos can actually ult off an allied Taliyah's Ult.
They can also ult off of a Jayce hammer q. This tilts the fuck out of me when I play Jayce againt him.
It's worse when you play Tristana. You're low and try to escape him with W, but you forget that W let's Yasuo ult you.

> [{quoted}](name=MisterShameless,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKb4Rdgx,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-31T05:06:11.033+0000)
>
> It's worse when you play Tristana. You're low and try to escape him with W, but you forget that W let's Yasuo ult you.

i feel your pain{{champion:115}} ...
Neither Zigg's own satchel charge nor Tristanas jump triggers Yasuo's ultimate. If they did, the every dash in the game would do the same.

They do. Its happen to me on multiple occasions. Maybe it was a glitch or something if its not suppose to.

Edit: Turns out it may have been a glitch, just tested it out against a tristana bot and Yasuo can't ult her W anymore.

They do not, as neither champion is rendered "airborne". Neither is being displaced against their will 

You can't find videos of it because it doesn't exist.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKb4Rdgx,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-31T14:27:23.028+0000)
>
> They do not, as neither champion is rendered "airborne". Neither is being displaced against their will 
> 
> You can't find videos of it because it doesn't exist.

technically you are both right.. originally they were targetable by yasuo's ulti.. but it was deemed a bad mechanic so it was removed.
so it DID use to work, but it no longer does.
Anivia's wall does the same.
Try to get a video of this and post it in the Bugs section.
That's the plan after this game, we where discussing it xD It's already in the bugs section but a video would help, yes.

it should

mf shouldn't get a gamebreaking ult and tank stats at the same time, it's just disgusting

> [{quoted}](name=King of Mongoose,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKb4Rdgx,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-30T18:16:05.475+0000)
>
> it should
> 
> mf shouldn't get a gamebreaking ult and tank stats at the same time, it's just disgusting

you know that outside of laning phase her ult is the only thing that makes her good right?

> [{quoted}](name=free software,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKb4Rdgx,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-08-30T20:38:50.755+0000)
>
> you know that outside of laning phase her ult is the only thing that makes her good right?

wat did i just read

but i guess ppl dont know how to abuse polymorph hehe xd

> [{quoted}](name=Cancerous Lulu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NKb4Rdgx,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-08-30T20:55:56.182+0000)
>
> wat did i just read
> 
> but i guess ppl dont know how to abuse polymorph hehe xd

tbh after re-reading it i cant believe i actually wrote that

That's just not true and you know it. She has a rather nice AOE slow, her AAs hurt just as much as the next ADC and her roaming potential is really nice with that move speed. And that's not mentioning the potential damage of double up in team fights.
I don't think you understand quite what "gamebreaking" means.

I'll just add this here.

I tried doing the same thing in a custom game, MF was still ulting. Did you remember what else was happening that caused MF to stop ulting? Or did MF cancelled it on her own and didn't realize?
